titles.title: Chapter 7 Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2011
To provide for improvements to the administration of bankruptcy in cases under chapter 7 of title 11 of the United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 7/27/2011--Introduced. Chapter 7 Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2011 - Amends federal bankruptcy law to: (1) increase the limits governing trustee compensation in a case under chapter 7; and (2) authorize the court, in determining the amount of reasonable compensation to be awarded to a trustee under chapter 7, to treat such compensation as a commission.
